text: Luciano De Ambrosis (born 1937) is an Italian actor and voice actor from Turin. He is the father of the voice actor Massimo De Ambrosis. He is an actor, known for The Ring (2002), Once Upon a Time in America (1984) and La piovra (1984). title: Luciano De Ambrosis
